message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.HashSet' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.villagedefense.handlers.language.Messages'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.Set' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.villagedefense.handlers.language.Messages'.
WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
'+' should be on a new line.
